definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)

sentences.english: The rational disposition of anti-TBM units is a precondition and a key factor to intercept TBM.
sentences.chinese: 合理部署反導兵器是攔截TBM的前提和關鍵。

sentences.english: U.S. anti-missile ships are moving into the Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 美國的反導艦艇目前正開進波斯灣。

sentences.english: And with the pros and cons of cloth guide conversion device, convenient for producing .
sentences.chinese: 並配正反導布轉換裝置，方便生產。

sentences.english: Anti-missile batteries are being deployed on the Arab shore.
sentences.chinese: 反導裝置也正被部署在阿拉伯海岸。

sentences.english: Some NATO allies remain anxious about cooperating with Russia on missile defense.
sentences.chinese: 某些北約盟國對與俄羅斯進行反導合作感到擔心。

sentences.english: Deterrence, not antimissile interceptors, is still the best defense.
sentences.chinese: 威懾而非反導攔截仍是最佳的防禦手段。

sentences.english: They will test-fire an anti-missile missile next week.
sentences.chinese: 他們將於下週試射反導彈導彈。

sentences.english: However, the NATO anti-missile system construction plan met opposition from Russia.
sentences.chinese: 然而，北約反導系統建設計劃遭到俄羅斯的反對。

sentences.english: Thus, remote setting becomes the necessary trend of short range anti-missile's development.
sentences.chinese: 因此，遙控裝定就成爲近程反導彈藥發展的必然趨勢。

sentences.english: The effort will include the deployment of four anti-ballistic-missile-equipped destroyers to the coast of Spain.
sentences.chinese: 包括在西班牙海岸設置四架反導彈驅逐艦。
